contents.item: The Lord is God. God is Holy.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: She was always fighting a battle but her smile would never tell you so.
One mind, One master.
The garden of God is full of ripen fruits.
A single minded vision gives the strength of purpose.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: It is sad that people seek money more than wisdom.
Everything that humans have achieved until now, were once merely an imagination in someone’s head.
With great diligent, pursue your dreams.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Experience gives the greatest lessons of life.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Every great accomplishments requires great grace and great enthusiasm.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: We must not only exist but find and fulfill our specific mission on earth.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: How can we tell when trouble shall arise?
The jar shall never ceased to be filled with oil.
To be free is to seek faith.
The miss steps are the mistakes you must make.
With persistent perseverance, you can break through any barrier.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Experience is everything.
The quality of our lives depends on the quality of our thinking.
Faith is like the freshness of dewdrops.
Without toil, would there be any tears?
The event of history is hidden in time.
Lift yourself to great heights.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: I do not know everything. I ought to keep learning.
You possess a divine strength to fulfill your dream.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Confidence creates courage.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: In the grace of the Truth, re-examine all that you have been told.
The confidence God gives is the courage to dare a greater life.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: In my quest to search for knowledge, I know God, the source of knowledge.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Life is a moment of miracles.
Reading leads to good character development.
Anytime, someone gives you advice, rethink if it will lead to personal progress.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: The world of books is heavenly paradise.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: The living souls have the breath of life.
Literature is sacred knowledge
The greatest strength is the spirit of endurance.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: The stars of heaven gives light.
God is the Prince of Peace.
Let your dreams keep you hopeful!
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: It is better to be foolish wise than wise foolish.
Accept life as the greatest gift.
Faith is expressed in love.
Is there any hope for the dead?
The wonders of the holy wonder is timeless mystery.
Every child ought to know the light of knowledge.
Daily dance uplift the soul to spiritual realms.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: True success is the soundness of being.
Literature is a sacred knowledge.
Real education is never acquisition of knowledge but training of character.
Your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit.
With conscious effort, you can be a reader.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: When you build a house You nail down memories Paint and stain the fabric of time
You can use the stumbling blocks to build your success.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: It is my toughest time but the greatest.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Life is a dancing dream.
New morning, new moment of miracles.
Resentment leads to rude behaviour.
Don’t despise any experience. With every experience, you increase in knowledge and wisdom.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Man without his maker is like root without a tender shoot.
If you don't know where you are going, you can arrive at any destination.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: In the achievement of dreams demands 100 percent dedication.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: We must turn from worthless things towards faith in God.
Who can count the sand by the sea?
Science is theology for an atheist
Too much study depletes the soul of its strength.
None of our achievement matters, than how we have lived our lives.
When you are wise, peace shall follow.
It is better to be helpful than harmful.
The traveler knows the grace of travel.
We find ourselves in the pursuit of our dreams.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Forget all about ‘What if’. Believe in possibilities.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Intelligence is overrated. Wisdom is under applied.
The splendor of God is displayed in the stars with the magnificent of the moon.
Love is a kind of insanity.
We do not know the details in a day. How can we foretell the happenings in distant time.
Every student adheres to strict discipline
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: There is no failure in life. It is only an experience.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Knowledge is an intellectual art.Wisdom is a spiritual discipline.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: There is neither mistake nor failures. It is only experience.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: The “right time’ is now. Go onward and fulfill your dream.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: How could we have found, who we really are, without education?
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Education means breaking free from the manacles of limitations put forward by primitive ignorance.
Intelligence seeks reasons behind things. Wisdom looks for things behind reasons.
Man is but his belief.
Run your own race of life, with a single minded vision of purpos
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

contents.item: Reading leads to knowledge and wise ways of living.
To doubt the existence of God is the greatest delusion.
Do not take to heart everything you hear.
It is better to dwell on the beautiful things in life than the negative.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Adversity is an adventure.

contents.item: What I must know, only the Master teaches!
